logline: Three friends compete to create the ultimate smoothie, blending health with hilarity in a colorful kitchen.

background.description: A bright, colorful kitchen filled with fresh fruits and a blender.

characters.name: JAKE
characters.description: Mid-20s, laid-back, goofy hat, loves trying new things.

characters.name: MIKE
characters.description: Late 20s, overly enthusiastic, smoothie expert, a bit clueless.

beats.description: JAKE stands by the blender, holding a banana with a mischievous grin.
SARAH rolls her eyes at JAKE's gummy bears.
MIKE bounces in, excited about adding chocolate syrup.
JAKE suggests calling it a 'dessert smoothie.'
SARAH smirks, calling it a 'regret smoothie.'
JAKE presses the blender button; it sputters and sprays smoothie everywhere.
JAKE laughs, calling it a 'splat-er smoothie.'
